channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
So, I decided to make a 317. I've chosen a blank 317 with the old 3.2 moparscape client. But now, I can't choose.
Should I make a server that's really like with a home at a weird place, many commands, lvl 99 in 2 hits and all weird things,
or just a standard 317 with as home lumbridge or varrock and with standard shops at the standard place with not so much commands and standard newbie npc's to train on?
Which one do you think will be the best?

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

arham 4:

1rst one, just decrease the exp timer so player can train normally and change the home.

Well, then it’s getting a bit closer to a normal server. I really just want or the first one without changing anything else or the last one without chaning anything else…

Read full topic
